attr.title: Vampire's Best Friend
attr.desc: Vampire hunters are after a mischievous vampire girl, and it's up to her pet bat to save the day. Flap through peril in this open-ended precision “batformer” with a unique control scheme that re-contextualizes precision platformer trappings and flips them upside-down!
attr.inst: Install port. Purchase the game or download demo on Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/3583530/Vampires_Best_Friend/). Copy Vampire's Best Friend.exe or Vampire's Best Friend Demo.exe file from the game folder into the ports/vampiresbestfriend/assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Install port. Purchase the game or download demo on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3583530/Vampires_Best_Friend/). Copy `Vampire's Best Friend.exe` or `Vampire's Best Friend Demo.exe` file from the game folder into the `ports/vampiresbestfriend/assets` folder.
